when I started playing it was already hard to have multiple people survive matches. now it seems that every update shifts the balance even more to the killers making it nearly impossible to get out.    the lack of  balancing in this game is pretty bad as all they do is put out more characters and extras to buy.    Is it fun early on, yeah, but after a while you see how bad this game actually is and regret spending money on it.
If you purchase this game you'll never have to buy table salt ever again.
Game is overall pretty great. Wait times suck after 8pm and crossplay is annoying, but other than that I love it!

This is a game that sees alot of debate, either from player to player, or player to Dev. These could be a form of edicate on how you should act, to why does this character have this power/ability/X that behaves in this way.

But i dont really care about that. YOU shouldnt care to much about that, not when your trying to figure out if you wanna buy it. So lets simplify it a bit:
Is it fun - Yes
Single or multiplayer- play with friends or by your self
Is this game supported by devs - Yes in the for of payed DLC aswell as Quality of life updates, constantly trying to find a good balance*
Graphics and sound - more than playable at minium, but max settings are NOT required to be sucsessful

As a final note, this game is definatly worth some time to play and learn, new killers and survivors are being added to add new ways to play. 
*Because of pevious updates and perks, balnce can be hard and the devs try there best to appeal to all partys that play the game best advice i can give to help Break the Meta! give the devs some data to see how other perks are used  in the current build in real play so they see what needs tweaking, sticking to a meta builds just leads to false data and stagnations

Pros:
1. The custom blood path / upgrades in the UI seemed neat.  I don't know if that stuff gets wiped out over time or if you get to keep it forever though.
2. The characters look cool.  Definitely some interesting costumes: you can go bright pink and blue if you feel like being very visible.
3. For-purchase upgrades seem reasonable but I didn't purchase any virtual currency.
4. When you play as a killer the scratch marks are helpful.

Cons:
1. Didn't care for the mechanics or the missions.  I guess you fix the same 4 or 5 generators in every level?  That's really it?
2. "Sorry guys, I can't look left or right because I'm crawling through a window for the next ten seconds.  Also, when I'm out of the window, I will look straight ahead and can't move for two seconds."
3. No jumping, crouching, sprinting as the killer.  (At least not as bunny, nurse, leatherface).
4. "I'm a hell-fiend capable of warping through walls and I'm going to murder you!  Unless you throw a small palette on the ground.  Oh blast this thing, I'll never get past it!"

Update June 20, 2022

I wanted to update this review to reflect that there are a lot of positive changes that have been made and that are further coming. When I originally wrote this review, I really didn't see any positive direction in the game, but now it appears the developers are pursuing betterment of the game! For that reason, I do recommend this game ON ON OF THREE CONDITIONS.

(1) You have friends OR anticipate making friends that play this game. This game is LOADS more fun with friends. The only reason I play it is because of that.

(2) You are genuinely interested in the horror genre/ love horror icons.

(3) You get it at a sale. 

If one of those three apply it is an easy sell, otherwise I would consider it a hard maybe.

-------------------
I used to love this game a lot! I think that I am sort of jaded, and I have a little over 500 hours on the game. I have purchased DLC for it, and there are a few cosmetic things that got ahold of me. If you are planning to play this game with a few friends and have fun here and there then it's def the game for you! I got into the game, but the more I played it the more bugs I have found that haven't been resolved. Furthermore, it seems that the developer has opted for a pseudo "pay to win" by having specific perks tied to DLC only characters who must be purchased with real money as opposed to in game currency (which there are three of by the way). 

The game hasn't changed much since I've gotten it, and from my understanding it hasn't changed since launch all that much. You will experience the inevitable bad-mannered killers that will make it virtually impossible for survivors to have fun because they "hook you" and stare at you so your friends can't come and save you OR they can but they immediately go down. 

That's not to say that the game isn't fun! I just find those moments to be fleeting, whereas I used to love playing this game daily, it infuriates me too much now a days with toxic survivors and toxic killers that both strive to make the other angry. That, coupled with the developer focusing on cosmetics (at $10 an outfit) to get quick cash as opposed to fixing the bugs, this game has personally run its course for me. But I did get my money's worth, I've played this game for 500 hours! 

On a true scale of 1-10 where 5 is truly average, I give this game a straight 5; 6 if you plan to play with friends.

The way most matches as Survivor work is it's either a breeze and the killer is easily escaped, or it's absolute slaughter with little to no chance. There's no in-between. The fact that the only gameplay mechanic is generators is also a bit boring, dull, and downright repetitive. This is primarily due to the clueless matchmaking system, but also just the way the game is set up to play.

I do somewhat enjoy the game, but the mechanics and "cash-grab" DLC and skins are just laughable. Being this is Behaviour Interactive Inc.'s "One Hit Wonder" it's no surprise they're milking it for all they can, it would just be nice if they spent more time adding different gameplay elements (perhaps an entirely different mode altogether).

Overall the game is a decent grinding experience, but only with friends (unless you play Killer). However, where the game falls flat is with the developers unwillingness to add more balanced features or experiment with ideas. There are certain numerous items and perks in the game that are utterly, and painfully useless (both for Killer and Survivor).

И так, у игры есть как плюсы так и минусы. Идея игры хорошая, много разных маньяков и выживших. У каждого маньяка свой геймплей, не нравится один взял другого. Оптимизация тоже не плоха, но нужно учитывать, что для такой игры нужно как можно больше fps. Ну и без багов никуда... Сурвы могут застрять в шкафах, земле и стенах. Система рангов не работает, да и смысла прокачивать свой ранг нет, только если хотите похвастаться перед пацанами на райончике. Мачмейкинг - это как русская рутелка, повезëт или нет, вы можете играть на 20 ранге и вам попадëтся топ ман на 1м ранге. Или же играете вы на выживших у вас 1й ранг и вам попадается 20- 15 ранги как на Мане так и на сурвах. Радует, то что над системой рангов начали работать, и я надеюсь что дбд будет дальше процветать. Стоит ли брать эту игру? Это решать вам, но если она вам понравилась и вы готовы терпеть токсичность комьюнити, то вперëд!
